identified-content.person: BODKIN, MADELEINE ELIZABETH COLQUHOUN (MADELEINE ELIZABETH COLQUHOUN RICE)

block.p: Madeleine Elizabeth Colquhoun Bodkin was married yesterday on Fire Island to Marc Nicholas Rice. The Rev. Martin B. Copenhaver, a Congregational minister, officiated at the Church at Point o'Woods, with Msgr. John F. Corr taking part.

Mrs. Rice, 29, is a vice president and stock trader at Deutsche Banc Alex. Brown in Manhattan. She graduated from Georgetown University. She is a daughter of Irene Bodkin and Francis F. Bodkin Jr. of Brooklyn. Her father operates Bodkin Research, an investment company in Manhattan, and is a former member of the New York Stock Exchange.

Madeleine Elizabeth Colquhoun Bodkin was married yesterday on Fire Island to Marc Nicholas Rice. The Rev. Martin B. Copenhaver, a Congregational minister, officiated at the Church at Point o'Woods, with Msgr. John F. Corr taking part.

Mrs. Rice, 29, is a vice president and stock trader at Deutsche Banc Alex. Brown in Manhattan. She graduated from Georgetown University. She is a daughter of Irene Bodkin and Francis F. Bodkin Jr. of Brooklyn. Her father operates Bodkin Research, an investment company in Manhattan, and is a former member of the New York Stock Exchange.

Mr. Rice, 31, is a managing director and bond trader in Manhattan for ABN Amro, the Dutch bank. He graduated from Skidmore College. He is the son of the late Adrianne K. Rice. His mother, who was known as Puff, was a travel agent and a vice president at Pisa Brothers Travel in Manhattan.
